summary: An email scheduling a meeting on August 15, 2019, following a visit to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) regarding Epstein. The meeting includes the MCC team, main Justice Department officials, FBI, and Inspector General representatives.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Geoff requested a meeting to be held on August 15, 2019, after an MCC visit, involving multiple agencies.

events.title: MCC/Epstein Meeting
events.description: A meeting scheduled from 12-2pm following a visit to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), involving the MCC team, main Justice Department officials, FBI, and Inspector General representatives.

locations: 8th floor library (presumably at a Justice Department or related office building)
keyFacts: A high-level interagency meeting was scheduled for August 15, 2019, concerning Epstein, who was held at the MCC.
The meeting was to involve personnel from the MCC, the main Justice Department, the FBI, and the Inspector General's office.
The email indicates coordinated oversight and investigation activities among multiple federal agencies regarding Epstein's incarceration shortly before his death.
